subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat Novak Djokovic, 7-5, 6-3, in a rain-delayed final in Rome to win his record sixth Italian Open and regain the No. 2 ranking.
snippet: Rafael Nadal beat Novak Djokovic, 7-5, 6-3, in a rain-delayed final in Rome to win his record sixth Italian Open and regain the No. 2 ranking.
